title: Fundamental Theorem with derivative of integral

content.question: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the derivative with respect to x of the integral from 2 to x of the square root of open parentheses 1 plus t squared close parentheses with respect to t equals"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mi>d</mi> <mrow> <mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> </mfrac> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mi>X</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msqrt> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup> <mi>t</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaamizaaWdaeaapeGaamizaiaadIhaaaWaa8qC a8aabaWdbmaakaaapaqaa8qacaaIXaGaey4kaSIaamiDa8aadaahaa Wcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaaqabaaapaqaa8qacaaIYaaapaqaa8qacaWG ybaaniabgUIiYdGccaWGKbGaamiDaiabg2da9aaa@4446@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="1 divided by the square root of open parentheses 2 times the square root of open parentheses 1 plus x squared close parentheses close parentheses minus 1 divided by open parentheses 2 times the square root of 5 close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mrow> <mn>2</mn><msqrt> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>−</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mrow> <mn>2</mn><msqrt> <mn>5</mn> </msqrt> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmamaakaaapaqaa8qa caaIXaGaey4kaSIaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaaqaba aaaOGaeyOeI0YaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdaa8aabaWdbiaaikdadaGc aaWdaeaapeGaaGynaaWcbeaaaaaaaa@3F61@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

topic.text: 6.4: The Fundamental Theorem of Calculus and Accumulation Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
